Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using the Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1 is that it has been deployed on devnet for testing purposes. The mainnet deployment timeline remains uncertain due to ongoing issues with the Beacon Chain's block proposer rotation.


The CL team made progress on implementing a new consensus algorithm, but further work needs to be done before its integration into Ethereum 2.0 can begin. A deadline of two weeks has been set for this task to be completed.


A discussion was held regarding the implementation of sharding in Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1. The team is still working on resolving issues related to shard data availability and cross-shard communication.


The EL team reported that they are making progress with implementing the execution environment, but there were some concerns raised about its compatibility with the CL's new consensus algorithm.
